Further Reading:

Roy Liebman, Vitaphone Films: A Catalogue of Features and Shorts. Jefferson, NC: McFarland & Company, Inc., 2003.

Scott Eyman, The Speed of Sound: Hollywood and the Talkie Revolution, 1926-1930. New York: Simon & Schuster, 1997.

Richard Koszarski, Hollywood on the Hudson: Film and Television in New York from Griffith to Sarnoff. New Brunswick: Rutgers University Press, 2008.

Donald Crafton, The Talkies: American Cinema’s Transition to Sound, 1926-1931 (History of the American Cinema, Vol. 4). Berkeley: University of California Press, 1999.
